GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.4.223
GSD.description:
net/mlx5: Fix possible use-after-free in async command interface

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.223 by commit 69dd3ad406c49aa69ce4852c15231ac56af8caf9, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit e355477ed9e4f401e3931043df97325d38552d54. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net/mlx5: Fix possible use-after-free in async command interface
